title: Memory Leak Issues
body: I've been experiencing memory leaks for ages now, and I've finally dwindled down the suspects to LoL. Every time I launch the game and close it, I don't recover all of my memory. Eventually it caps at 75% memory usage when I'm running nothing according to Task Manager. This causes me to have to restart my computer constantly so I can play other games that are memory heavy. Any fixes or possible solutions?

replies.body: Straaaaange this is the first I'm hearing of any possible memory leak coming from League. If you're sure that's the cause, hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with the data/proof you've gathered so they can get started on fixing that!
